doc:
Geoffrey Horne https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Geoffrey_Horne 0 Geoffrey Horne (born August 22, 1933) is an American actor, director, and acting coach at the Lee Strasberg Theatre and Film Institute. His screen credits include The Bridge on the River Kwai, Bonjour Tristesse, The Strange One, Two People, The Twilight Zone episode "The Gift" in 1962, and as Wade Norton in "The Guests" episode of The Outer Limits. Geoffrey_Horne ( born August_22_,_1933 ) is an_American_actor , director , and acting_coach at the_Lee_Strasberg_Theatre and Film_Institute . His_screen_credits include The_Bridge on the_River_Kwai , Bonjour_Tristesse , The_Strange_One_,_Two_People , The_Twilight_Zone_episode " The_Gift " in 1962 , and as Wade_Norton in " The_Guests_"_episode of The_Outer_Limits .
